name: The True Cream Aqua Bomb with Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide
about: What it is: A bestselling moisturizer that boosts skin hydration levels by 231.4 percent and delivers hydration to ten layers of the skin in as little as ten seconds...Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers intense hydration..- Niacinamide: Gently exfoliates dead skin cells..- Napiers Original and Aqua Formulas: Herbal formulas help the skin feel fresh and moisturized...What Else You Need to Know: As the pioneers of Korean Skincare, our iconic facial gel cream is lightweight, fast-absorbing, and is formulated with hyaluronic acid and niacinamide to deliver intense and fast hydration to ten layers of the skin in as little as ten seconds after application. This formula is dermatologically tested...Clinical Results: In a clinical test, results showed:.- 231.4% rapid increase in skin hydration level..In clinical testing tape stripping skin layers and a stripped skin instrumental study, results showed:.- Delivers intense hydration to the skin 10 layers deep in just 10 seconds after application..In a survey of 30 subjects:.- 100% agreed that skin was hydrated immediately and visibly replenished the skin
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Intensely hydrates..-Niacinamide: Gently exfoliates dead skin cells..-Napieru2019s Original and Aqua Formulas: Are herbal formulas that help the skin feel fresh and moisturized...Water/Eau, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Methyl Trimethicone, Alcohol Denat., Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, PEG/PPG/Polybutylene Glycol-8/5/3 Glycerin, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Nepeta Cataria Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Leaf Extract, Baptisia Tinctoria Root Extract, Stellaria Media (Chickweed) Extract, Alchemilla Vulgaris Leaf Extract, Equisetum Arvense Leaf Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Niacinamide, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Panthenol, PEG-150, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Squalane, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Dimethiconol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, C14-22 Alcohols, Polysorbate 60, Butylene Glycol, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Malachite Extract, Triethylhexanoin, Trisodium EDTA, Arachidyl Glucoside, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Stearic Acid, Ceramide NP, Cholesterol, PEG-100 Stearate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil , Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil , Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citral , Citronellol , Limonene, Geraniol, Linalool.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After cleansing and toning, apply a dime-size amount (or more) to skin with a gentle patting motion..-Can be used daily, AM and PM. ..Precautions:.-Discontinue use if irritation or a rash occurs..-Consult a physician if irritation persists. .-Do not use on broken or damaged skin. .-Avoid eye area..-Keep out of reach of children. .-Do not store at extreme temperatures or in direct sunlight..-For external use only.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only used this once so far, mini size. Something in the formula makes skin feel very smooth. Too early for results but feels nice and has little scent.
